content.description: Probably the only line on this boulder, and a proud one!Start with a right hand at the base of the right side of the arete (two inches from the arete corner) and with a left hand on the left side in a slopey scoop. Clamber your way to the top (dont blow it or youll play bumper cars all the way down).
content.location: Downhill facing prow. This boulder is 20ft up and slightly left (from the downhill perspective) of the Wave Boulder

content.description:
Just off of the trail and above the Wave Boulder. 

  This is a proud boulder with an obvious elevated, right angled prow. The boulder is wedged in between two smaller boulders and sits off of the ground at about 4 feet.
